TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CodeDomComponentSerializationService extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService
Public NotInheritable Class CodeDomComponentSerializationService Inherits ComponentSerializationService

summary.span: 将一组组件序列化到一个序化列存储区中。

span.span: Serializes a set of components into a serialization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将一组组件或可序列化的对象序列化到序列化存储区。The class serializes a set of components or serializable objects into a serialization store. 存储可以然后反序列化在更高版本时。The store can then be deserialized at a later time. 类与不同的其他序列化方案的序列化格式是不透明的而且它允许的部分序列化对象。The class differs from other serialization schemes in that the serialization format is opaque, and it allows for partial serialization of objects. 例如，你可以选择只序列化所选的属性的对象。For example, you can choose to serialize only selected properties for an object. 基本类、 ，替换接口从.NET Framework 1.0 版中，尽管后者保留用于向后兼容。The base class, , replaces the interface from the .NET Framework version 1.0, although the latter is retained for backward compatibility. 类未实现接口，但是，如果你查询、提供桥实施，以确保向后兼容性。The class does not implement the interface, but if you query for , the provides a bridge implementation to ensure backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化存储区可以传递给任何方法以生成一组对象的序列化状态。The serialization store can be passed to any of the methods to build up serialization state for a group of objects.

summary.span: 将给定 反序列化为给定容器，还可以应用默认属性值。

span.span: Deserializes the given to the given container, optionally applying default property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法反序列化给定的存储，但而不是生成新的对象，存储中的数据应用于一组现有对象，将从`container`参数。The method deserializes the given store, but rather than producing new objects, the data in the store is applied to an existing set of objects that are taken from the `container` parameter. 因此，调用方可以提前创建一个对象但它认为合适。As a result, the caller can create in advance an object however it sees fit. 如果对象有反序列化状态，并且在现有对象的一套不命名该对象，将创建一个新的对象。If an object has deserialization state and the object is not named in the set of existing objects, a new object will be created. 如果该对象还实现，它将添加到给定的容器。If that object also implements , it will be added to the given container. 容器中的对象必须具有名称和匹配中现有对象要使用的顺序的序列化存储区中的对象的类型。Objects in the container must have names and types that match objects in the serialization store in order for an existing object to be used.

summary.span: 在给定对象上序列化给定成员。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以为要生成的序列化存储区中的序列化成员的列表的同一对象多次调用。This method can be invoked multiple times for the same object to build up a list of serialized members within the serialization store. 成员通常必须是一个属性或事件。The member generally has to be a property or an event.

span.span: The to which member will be serialized.

The given member.

summary.span: 在给定对象上序列化给定成员，但如果成员包含默认属性值，则也序列化该成员。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object, but also serializes the member if it contains the default property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于某些成员包含默认属性值和设置还原到成员相同的值是不同的概念。For some members, containing the default property value and setting the same value back to the member are different concepts. 例如，如果属性从父对象继承其值，如果未不设置任何本地值，将该值设置为该属性返回不可能正确的结果。For example, if a property inherits its value from a parent object if no local value is set, setting the value back to the property may not be what is desired. 方法考虑到这一点，并将在此情况下清除的属性的状态。The method takes this into account and would clear the state of the property in this case.
